lvefPage.title: Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF)
lvefPage.subtitle: LVEF Calculator & Visualization
lvefPage.description: Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) is a measurement of the percentage of blood leaving your heart each time it contracts.

attentionPage.title: Attention Dot Visualization
attentionPage.subtitle: Eye-Tracking Attention Visualization
attentionPage.description: This visualization demonstrates how attention dots work in eye-tracking technology. Click anywhere on the canvas to simulate eye gaze points.

about.heading: About Attention Dots
about.description: Attention dots (or gaze points) represent where a user's eyes are focused on a screen. Eye-tracking technology is used in user experience research, medical diagnostics, and accessibility applications.
